item.title: From Finite Automata to Regular Languages - Implementation Par
item.author: Author
item.description: This article can be seen as “from infinite automata to regular expressions” of this additional article, mainly to provide JAVA to achieve from DFA to RE conversion. Because the code is copied from the assignment, I don’t know if there will be any copyright problem, but this is not considered commercial use, and some of the code is written by me, so it should not be a big problem. item.title: DFA and NFA -- 1
item.author: Author
item.description: Some understanding of the formal definition of DFA and NFA, as well as the proof of regular operation closure and the equivalence of DFA and NFA, that is, the story of DFA belongs to NFA, is the special case and regular story yet.
